sentences.cn: 他生气时,会说不出话来.

sentences.en: He had fallen on his knees in inarticulate prayer, weeping.
sentences.cn: 他双膝跪在地上,口齿不清的祷告着, 哭哭啼啼的.

sentences.en: He held out his hand with a gesture which conveyed something of this inarticulate conflict.
sentences.cn: 他伸出手,做个手势以表达他那难以言状的矛盾心情.

sentences.en: He launches into an inarticulate tirade against conventional people.
sentences.cn: 他词不达意地发表了一通激烈言论攻击因循守旧的人们.

sentences.en: He left me inarticulate with rage.
sentences.cn: 他把我气得说不出话来。

sentences.en: He was inarticulate and stupid in thought.
sentences.cn: 他不善于表达自己的思想,显得有点笨拙.

sentences.en: His parents were dull and inarticulate.
sentences.cn: 他的父母亲头脑愚钝又不善说话.

sentences.en: Inarticulate and rather shy, he had always dreaded speaking in public.
sentences.cn: 他不善言辞又相当害羞，一直害怕在公共场合讲话。

sentences.en: Kempton made an inarticulate noise at the back of his throat as if he were about to choke.
sentences.cn: 肯普顿嗓子眼里发出含混的声音，仿佛他要窒息了。

sentences.en: She broke continually into shouts of a wild , inarticulate, and sometimes piercing music.
sentences.cn: 她兴高采烈得不肯安分地走在她母亲身边, 而且象鸟儿一样地蹦跳着.

sentences.en: She saw his eyes and gave another inarticulate cry.
sentences.cn: 她看到了他的眼睛,又发出一声含糊不清的喊叫.

sentences.en: She uttered an inarticulate exclamation, and stood fixed.
sentences.cn: 她发出一声不清晰的叫声, 便站在那里不动了.

sentences.en: Talk of chestnuts loosened the tongue of this inarticulate young man.
sentences.cn: 因为栗子,正苦无话可说的年青人,得到同情他的人了.

sentences.en: The birds sang in the tree - tops; but their song, however sweet, was inarticulate.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿在树梢间唱歌; 可是,它们的歌声不管多么甜蜜, 却无法让人理解.

sentences.en: They met at a turn and kissed with laughter and exclamations inarticulate and stirring.
sentences.cn: 他们在拐角处相遇了,又是笑,又是吻,激动得连说话都语无伦次了.

words.tran_cn: 口齿不清地；难以表达地
口齿不清的；说不出话的；[动][无脊椎]无关节的

trans.tran_cn: 不善辞令的，笨口拙舌，嘴笨
